metadata.name: Bubble Bath #001
metadata.description:
Let this seamless loop guide your breathing and let you take a pause from your hustle and bustle with waves of procedurally created bubbles and soundwaves ( the sound is organically created straight from straws, glass, water and mic) 

It's ok to let your mind wander

It's my first NFT so any feedback is highly appreciated.

Size : 1080x1920 @24fps
Duration: 47 seconds
Other size; up to 8k is available by request and i'll send it directly

I'll provide any support that i can to assist after your purchase ( if you want custom size for your phone or pc or other screen so it'll loop in background and customize the file type for that)
